Featured Artist

Grandier Bella

Bellaâ€™s works are recognized for his deft handling of color with careful brush rendering. Often combining strong hues with complementing color schemes, he has successfully attained a level of realism in depicting his subjects. Works by Bella have been exhibited in several galleries in the Philippines, Denmark, Dubai, and the USA. He is currently affiliated with the Filipino Portrait Artists Guild, and a lecturer at the University of the Philippines College of Fine Arts.

More about Artist

Erehwon
Art Foundation, Inc.

The Erehwon Arts Foundation is a non-profit organization established in 2012 for the purpose of developing, providing and bringing Philippine culture and art to all sectors of society. It believes in the philosophy that art is essential in the development of the Filipino and the betterment of the members of a community.
